CustomField.formula:
IF( OR( ISPICKVAL( Reason_Status_Config__c , 'Cancel'), ISPICKVAL(Reason_Status_Config__c , 'Complaint'), ISPICKVAL(Reason_Status_Config__c , 'Follow Up'), ISPICKVAL(Reason_Status_Config__c , 'Done'), ISPICKVAL(Reason_Status_Config__c , 'Hard Contact'), ISPICKVAL(Reason_Status_Config__c , 'No Follow Up'), ISPICKVAL(Reason_Status_Config__c , 'No Pickup/ Mailbox'), ISPICKVAL(Reason_Status_Config__c , 'ALI - Wrong Number'), ISPICKVAL(Reason_Status_Config__c , 'Redebet'), ISPICKVAL(Reason_Status_Config__c , '')
), 1, 0 )
CustomField.label: Grand Total Collection Task ALI
